title: Ether, Silver in the Spotlight: Crypto Daybook Americas
contentSnippet: Your day-ahead look for Dec. 10, 2025

title: Pineapple Financial Starts Migrating its $10B Mortgage Portfolio Onchain via Injective
contentSnippet: The Canadian fintech has already put data tied to about $412 million in funded mortgages onchain, and aims to migrate more than 29,000 loans over time.

title: Twenty One Capital Drops in NYSE Debut as Bitcoin Treasury Firms Face ‘Broader Re-Pricing’
contentSnippet: The debut underperformed its SPAC benchmark, as investors pull back from Bitcoin treasury plays in favor of clearer operating models.

title: KindlyMD Turns to Kraken as Fourth Provider for Bitcoin-Backed $210M Loan at 8%
contentSnippet: An SEC filing shows the Kraken facility will be used to retire an outstanding Antalpha loan and requires significant bitcoin collateral.

title: TON Edges Higher to $1.64 as Consolidation Phase Continues
contentSnippet: Technical indicators suggest a slow base-building phase, but TON's price movement is likely to be influenced by today's Fed announcement.

title: Metaplanet Stock Jumps 12% as mNAV Climbs to 1.17, Highest Level Since Crypto Crisis
contentSnippet: Bitcoin rebound and equity momentum push Metaplanet valuation multiple to 1.17 to highest level since October.

title: Bitcoin ETFs turn positive with $152 million in inflows ahead of Fed rate decision, while traders stay defensive amid expected volatility: analysts
contentSnippet: Markets are focused on Powell's speech, as six of seven FOMC meetings this year were followed by bitcoin sell-offs, analysts said.

title: Crypto Markets Today: Fed Rate-Cut Hopes Lift BTC, ETH as Traders Brace for Volatility
contentSnippet: Crypto markets are firm ahead of Wednesday’s Federal Reserve decision, with a 25 basis-point interest-rate cut already priced in.

title: Elon Musk’s SpaceX moves another $95 million of its bitcoin stash amid reported 2026 IPO plans: Arkham
contentSnippet: The transaction marks the ninth such transfer this year, likely to consolidate custody and upgrade from legacy bitcoin addresses.

title: EU Opens Antitrust Probe Into Google's Use of Publisher, YouTube Content for AI
contentSnippet: Regulators are investigating whether the tech giant imposed unfair terms while locking rivals out of content that powers its own AI products.

title: Strive Starts $500M Preferred Stock "At-The-Money" Program for Bitcoin Purchases
contentSnippet: The new preferred stock offering, SATA, strengthens Strive’s capital options as it expands its bitcoin focused strategy.

title: US teachers union urges Senate to withdraw crypto market structure bill
contentSnippet: The AFT said the bill could expose working families to digital asset risks and set the stage for a future financial crisis.

title: Kalshi secures temporary relief on Connecticut enforcement as legal fight escalates
contentSnippet: A federal judge ordered Monday that Connecticut authorities should refrain from taking enforcement action against Kalshi for now.

title: IMF Flags Stablecoins as Source of Risk to Emerging Markets, Experts Say We Aren't There Yet
contentSnippet: The IMF warns that USD-pegged stablecoins could undermine local currencies in emerging markets by facilitating currency substitution and capital outflows.

title: XRP Sell Pressure Emerges as Ripple Linked Token Fails to Sustain $2.12 Break
contentSnippet: Despite briefly reaching $2.17, XRP failed to maintain momentum, suggesting large holders may be unwinding positions rather than accumulating.

title: Breakout or Bull Trap? DOGE Jumps Above Resistance on Ethereum Strength
contentSnippet: Despite the breakout, DOGE faces significant structural resistance from major EMAs.

title: Rep. Keith Self Moves to 'Fix the Bill' With CBDC Ban Before Key Hearing
contentSnippet: The amendment follows Republican outcry over broken commitments to ban central bank digital currencies in the defense bill.

title: Solana Liquidity Plummets to Bear Level Territory Amid $500M Liquidation Overhang
contentSnippet: On-chain data shows Solana's liquidity has contracted to bear-market levels, with $500M in long positions at risk if its price drops 5.5%.

title: Silk Road wallets move bitcoin to unknown address after decade of dormancy
contentSnippet: Hundreds of Silk Road-linked crypto wallets sprang back to life, sending $3.14 million worth of BTC to an unknown address.

title: Strive launches $500 million at-the-market offering for further bitcoin acquisitions
contentSnippet: Utilizing the ATM structure, Strive gains the flexibility to sell shares directly to the market at prevailing prices over a period.

title: KindlyMD enters $210 million USDT loan agreement with Kraken
contentSnippet: The proceeds would be used to repay its prior loan agreement with Singapore-based Antalpha formed in October.

title: AI Political Chatbots Can Sway Voters, New Research Finds
contentSnippet: The studies found policy-focused chatbot messages were more persuasive and that persuasion often rose alongside uneven inaccuracies.

title: Teachers Union Urges Senate to Scrap Crypto Market Structure Bill
contentSnippet: The union urged lawmakers to abandon the draft, arguing it would erode securities protections and heighten risks for pension holders.

title: ‘You ain’t seen nothing yet,” SEC Chair Atkins signals quick action on crypto priorities in the new year
contentSnippet: "You ain't seen nothing yet," said SEC Chair Paul Atkins as the agency faces a list of cryptocurrency-related priorities in the new year.

title: US Tech Giants Unite to Battle China’s Open-Source AI Dominance
contentSnippet: Anthropic and OpenAI donate key protocols to Linux Foundation as China overtakes US in open-source AI downloads.

title: War Department Launches New Platform With Google’s Gemini in Military AI Push
contentSnippet: Google’s IL5-approved model has become the first generative AI deployed across the War Department as competition with China grows.

title: SEC Chair Atkins Says Many Types of Crypto ICOs Are Outside Agency’s Purview
contentSnippet: SEC Chair Paul Atkins described which types of token sales wouldn't qualify as securities offerings, responding to Decrypt's question.

title: Bitcoin treasury XXI shares sink 20% in NYSE debut despite rising BTC price
contentSnippet: Twenty One wants to distinguish itself from pure bitcoin-holding firms by pushing into brokerage, credit, and other financial services.

title: Bitcoin 'After Dark' ETF Would Bet on BTC as Wall Street Sleeps
contentSnippet: The ETF would offer Bitcoin exposure when U.S. markets are closed.

title: The Daily: Standard Chartered slashes 2025 bitcoin target, PNC rolls out direct BTC trading for high-net-worth clients, and more
contentSnippet: The following article is adapted from The Block’s newsletter, The Daily, which comes out on weekday afternoons.

title: NFT winter deepens: Monthly sales hit lowest point of the year
contentSnippet: NFT sales fell to $320 million in November — their lowest this year — with early December off to a weak start as top collections slide across the board.

title: Animoca eyes stablecoins, AI, DePIN as it expands focus in 2026: Exec
contentSnippet: Animoca Brands’ Keyvan Peymani says the Web3 gaming company is exploring all segments of the crypto industry, including DePIN, DeFi and AI.

title: Conor McGregor calls out Khabib over NFTs, gets shut down by ZachXBT
contentSnippet: The former UFC champion tried to launch his own celebrity memecoin, REAL, in April, but the project failed to gain traction.

title: Memecoin market sinks to 2025 low as $5B wiped out in a day
contentSnippet: Both memecoins and NFTs have plunged to their weakest levels since early 2025, with traders pulling back from speculative assets across the board.

title: NFT and memecoin markets recover after month-long crypto slump
contentSnippet: NFTs posted selective gains led by blue chips, while memecoins rallied broadly across major names in a sentiment-driven rebound.

title: NFTs hit the brakes: Market cap tanks 46% in just 30 days
contentSnippet: CoinGecko data shows the NFT market value has nearly halved in a month, with even top collections like BAYC and CryptoPunks losing ground.

title: Valve’s Counter-Strike 2 update crashes $5.8B economy, revives NFT debate
contentSnippet: A major update to Counter-Strike 2’s item mechanics wiped nearly $2 billion from its $5.8 billion skin market, igniting debate over central control in gaming.

title: Coinbase splashes $25M to revive a podcast from the last bull run
contentSnippet: Coinbase has paid $25 million for an NFT that compels the once popular crypto podcast UpOnly to restart. Bull market vibes anyone?

title: OpenSea rejects pivot from NFTs, says it’s evolving to ‘trade everything’
contentSnippet: OpenSea CEO Devin Finzer says the platform isn’t abandoning NFTs but expanding into a universal onchain trading hub.

title: Swiss regulator GESPA takes aim at FIFA’s NFT platform in formal complaint
contentSnippet: Switzerland’s nationwide gambling authority said user rewards on the platform feature the element of chance, categorizing them as gambling.
